@reszahid There are similarities and overlaps for each. Like Netlify, Surge hosts static assets, where as Now can also run your Node back end or similar. I'm excited by Netlify's CI build pipeline, branch deploys, other useful fetures. We're big @gatsbyjs fans and it's a great fit.
